document_api_meta.title: Get Package Detail
document_api_meta.env_desc: Returns information about a package, including handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider information.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^package_id
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop package ID.

response_param.name: ^orders
response_param.desc: The response list of TikTok Shop orders.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop order ID.

response_param.name: ^^skus
response_param.desc: [Deprecated]SKU information.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: [Deprecated]SKU ID.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: [Deprecated]SKU name.

response_param.name: ^^^image_url
response_param.desc: [Deprecated]SKU image in order snapshot.

response_param.name: ^^^quantity
response_param.desc: [Deprecated]SKU quantity.

response_param.name: ^package_status
response_param.desc:
Possible values:
- `PROCESSING`: Package has been arranged by seller. Waiting for carrier to collect the parcel.
- `FULFILLING`: Package has been collected by carrier and in transit.
- `COMPLETED`: Package has been delivered.
- `CANCELLED`: Package has been canceled. Normally, the package is canceled due to the package being lost or damaged.

response_param.name: ^split_and_combine_tag
response_param.desc:
Possible values:
- `DEFAULT`: The package has not undergone any combine or split operation.
- `COMBINE`: The package has been consolidated with another order.
- `SPLIT`: The order has been split into multiple orders.

response_param.name: ^has_multi_skus
response_param.desc: Whether there are multiple SKU IDs in a package.

response_param.name: ^note_tag
response_param.desc:
Possible values:
- `BUYER_UNNOTED`: The order has not been noted by buyer.
- `BUYER_NOTED`: The order has been noted by buyer.

response_param.name: ^shipping_provider_name
response_param.desc: Package shipping provider name.

response_param.name: ^shipping_provider_id
response_param.desc: Package shipping provider ID.

response_param.name: ^shipping_type
response_param.desc:
The method of delivery. 
Possible values:
- `TIKTOK`: Shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain a shipping label from TikTok.
- `SELLER`: Seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller.

response_param.name: ^delivery_option_name
response_param.desc: Delivery option name. For display purposes only.

response_param.name: ^delivery_option_id
response_param.desc: Order delivery option ID. Delivery option ID is mapped to seller configured logistics templates ID.

response_param.name: ^tracking_number
response_param.desc: Package tracking number.

response_param.name: ^last_mile_tracking_number
response_param.desc: For cross-border order only. Cross-border order last mile tracking number.

response_param.name: ^pickup_slot
response_param.desc: Time slots available for pickup.

response_param.name: ^^start_time
response_param.desc: Start of the time slot when a package is scheduled to be picked up by carrier. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^^end_time
response_param.desc: End of time slot when a package is scheduled to be picked up by carrier. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^create_time
response_param.desc: Package creation time. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^handover_method
response_param.desc:
Whether the package is delivered by pick up or drop off. Possible values:
- `PICKUP`: A Logistics carrier will pickup the package(s) from the seller's pickup address.
- `DROP_OFF`: Seller will need to drop off the package(s) to a designated location.

response_param.name: ^order_line_item_ids
response_param.desc: The order line item ID contained in the package.

response_param.name: ^recipient_address
response_param.desc: Recipient address.

response_param.name: ^^full_address
response_param.desc: The complete recipient addresses information.

response_param.name: ^^phone_number
response_param.desc: The telephone number of the buyer. Please note, if this order use platform logistics, phone number will be desensitized.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the recipient. Please note, if this order uses platform logistics, recipient name will be desensitized

response_param.name: ^^postal_code
response_param.desc: The postal code that can be used by seller for shipping (in the U.S, this refers to the ZIP code).

response_param.name: ^^address_detail
response_param.desc: Full buyer detail address.

response_param.name: ^^region_code
response_param.desc: Region code.

response_param.name: ^^address_line1
response_param.desc: The first line of the street address

response_param.name: ^^address_line2
response_param.desc: The second line of the street address.

response_param.name: ^^address_line3
response_param.desc: The third line of the street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.

response_param.name: ^^address_line4
response_param.desc: The fourth line of the street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.

response_param.name: ^sender_address
response_param.desc: Sender address.

response_param.name: ^^full_address
response_param.desc: The complete sender addresses information.

response_param.name: ^^phone_number
response_param.desc: The telephone number of the sender.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the sender.

response_param.name: ^^postal_code
response_param.desc: The postal code of the sender.

response_param.name: ^^address_detail
response_param.desc: Full sender detail address.

response_param.name: ^^region_code
response_param.desc: Region code of the sender.

response_param.name: ^^address_line1
response_param.desc: The first line of the sender's street address.

response_param.name: ^^address_line2
response_param.desc: The second line of the sender's street address.

response_param.name: ^^address_line3
response_param.desc: The third line of the sender's street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.

response_param.name: ^^address_line4
response_param.desc: The fourth line of the sender's street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.

response_param.name: ^weight
response_param.desc: The weight of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^value
response_param.desc: The value of the weight of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement used to measure the weight. Possible values:
- `GRAM`
- `POUND`

response_param.name: ^dimension
response_param.desc: The dimensions of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^length
response_param.desc: The length of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc: The width of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc: The height of the scheduled package.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement used to measure the length. Possible values:
- `CM`
- `INCH`

response_param.name: ^update_time
response_param.desc: The time the package has been updated. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^insurance
response_param.desc: Provides details of shipping insurance auto-enrolled during label purchase

response_param.name: ^^is_purchased
response_param.desc: Whether insurance has been purchased for the package.

response_param.name: ^^coverage_amount
response_param.desc: The insurance coverage amount for the package. Units: USD.

response_param.name: ^^is_claim_eligible
response_param.desc: Whether the order is eligible for an insurance claim, based on eligible refund reasons.

response_param.name: ^^claim_status
response_param.desc:
The insurance claim status.
Available values:
- `NOT_STARTED`: Claim has not been initiated for this package.
- `CLAIM_PENDING`: Claim is currently under review.
- `APPROVED`: Claim has been approved.
- `DECLINED`: Claim has been declined.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on seller's behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of seller's orders.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on your behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of your orders.
